page.description: Set a blob to a bigger blob.
page.original:
.POKEB() Syntax .POKEB( Data as B, Position as N ) ArgumentDescription DataThe name of a blob variable. PositionThe byte position to write the data.
Description The .POKEB() method writes a blob to Position.The .POKEB() method does not change the size of the blob. Use the < BLOB>.RESIZE() method to change the size of a blob. See Also Blob Functions and Methods
